post.name: zzz_post.sh
post.content:
#!/bin/sh
{
mkdir -p /mnt/var/admin/
mount --bind /var/admin/ /mnt/var/admin/
mount --bind /run/ /mnt/run/
mount --bind /proc/ /mnt/proc/
mount --bind /sys/ /mnt/sys/
chroot /mnt/ /var/admin/autoinst/autoinst_cmd_late.sh
umount /mnt/sys/ /mnt/proc/ /mnt/run/ /mnt/var/admin/
} >> /var/admin/autoinst/autoinst_cmd_late.sh.log 2>&1
cp -pr /var/admin/* /mnt/var/admin/
exit 0
